slides.text: Challenge - solve the level and then come back and continue

slides.question: In which example will our hero say 'I don’t see an enemy'? when there is no enemy
options: if (enemy) { this.say('I don’t see an enemy'); }
if (enemy) { this.attack(enemy); } else { this.say('I don’t see an enemy'); }

slides.text: If you successfuly finished the challenge, click to complete the lesson.
